short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your job search on LinkedIn by hiding promoted listings, ensuring a more relevant and streamlined experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PromoFilter LinkedIn Assistant is a browser extension crafted to enhance the job search experience on LinkedIn. It empowers users with the ability to toggle a filter that automatically hides Promoted listings. This feature is designed to streamline your job search, ensuring that the listings you see are more relevant to your search criteria, free from clutter, and more closely aligned with your career aspirations.
